name: Ludum dare 49
description:
Press and hold the poster on the wall to read what the "master" witch taught us in potion class! I'm sure it will be helpful!

Nya painted her pawsport after getting drunk once at Paw's bar. She needs your "24-hour polymorph pawtion" to change her appawrance. You have 3 days to experimeow and help Nya disguise to pass the custom inspection.

Game Design: Robert LI, Ink SUN, AnoiF. LU, Kexian CHEN, Tilkey YANG 

Game Development: Robert LI, AnoiF. LU 

Game Art: Ink SUN

Compose & SoundFX: Tilkey YANG 

UI: Tilkey YANG, Ink SUN
